```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(self_contained_widgetframes = FALSE)
```

## Widgets in iFrames

### Leaflet

```{r leaflet-01}
library(leaflet)
library(widgetframe)
l <- leaflet(height=400) %>% addTiles() %>% setView(0,0,2)
frameWidget(l)
```

### Dygraph

```{r dygraph-01}
library(dygraphs)
ts <- dygraph(nhtemp, main = "New Haven Temperatures", height=350, width='95%')
frameWidget(ts)
```
